name: Faodail Technology
tagline: We help startups and SMBs to build their products
description:
We're a bunch of Geeks based out in Pune, India passionate about building great products with a focus on user experience. Our vision is to provide quality products & services that exceed the expectations of our esteemed customers. We use the expertise gained through making various products in different industry verticals to help others design and build great projects.
We firmly believe that our customers are the reason for our existence, and greatly respect the trust that they place in us. We grow through creativity and innovation. Our mission is to build long-term relationships with our customers.
